server.name: ai.scholargateway.connector/scholar-gateway
server.description:
Scholar Gateway enables Claude to generate responses grounded in peer-reviewed sources with verifiable citations and DOI links. The Scholar Gateway Connector searches current literature from Wiley journals and research databases to deliver evidence-backed answers with complete source metadata. This enables you to verify that claims are backed with sourced research — ensuring your Claude-assisted research meets professional research standards.

Note: The Scholar Gateway Connector provides access to Wiley content only, additional publisher sources will be added soon. Authentication required, please reach out to Wiley at scholargateway@wiley.com.
server.title: Scholar Gateway

com.anthropic.api/mcp-registry.oneLiner: Enhance responses with scholarly research and citations
com.anthropic.api/mcp-registry.htmlContent:
Enhance responses with scholarly research and citations. The Scholar Gateway Connector grounds Claude's responses in peer-reviewed sources with verifiable citations and DOI links, helping you ensure your Claude-assisted research meets professional research standards.

You can use the Scholar Gateway connector to:

Support literature reviews and academic writing:
"I'm researching marine ecosystem responses to microplastic pollution. Find recent studies from 2021–2025 on detection methods, uptake mechanisms, and ecosystem impacts. What does current research tell us about these areas? Provide citations so I can dig deeper into the sources"

Strengthen grant proposals with recent research:
"I'm writing a grant proposal on developing next-generation battery technologies for energy storage. What does recent research (2022–2025) tell us about solid-state batteries, particularly their safety advantages and manufacturing challenges?"

Find cross-disciplinary research connections:
"I'm a researcher working on clean energy policy effectiveness. What does recent research tell us about why people choose (or don't choose) to adopt renewable energy like solar panels? Please include studies from behavioral economics, psychology, and policy research from 2020–2025"

server.name: com.close/close-mcp
server.description:
The Close MCP server is a secure, standardized interface that lets Claude directly access and interact with your Close data. Core functionality with Claude:

• Connects Close to Claude via the Model Context Protocol so Claude can use Close as a trusted system of record.

• Read data (e.g., leads, contacts, opportunities, activities) based on your Close permissions.

• Optionally write data — you can allow only safe writes (e.g., create a lead) or full writes (e.g., edit/delete) during setup.

• Enables Claude to answer questions, summarize information, and perform actions in Close.
server.title: Close

com.anthropic.api/mcp-registry.oneLiner: Connect Claude to Close CRM to securely access and act on your sales data

Core functionality with Claude: Connects Close to Claude via the Model Context Protocol so Claude can use Close as a trusted system of record. server.name: com.figma.mcp/mcp
server.description:
The Figma MCP server helps you pull in Figma context and generate high-quality code that aligns with your codebase and design intent. Use the MCP server to retrieve code resources from Figma Design or Make files, and turn your ideas into production apps.

 **Key features:** 
• **Generate code from selected frames or nodes** - Select a frame in Figma or provide a node URL to have an AI agent turn your design into code. 
• **Extract design context from layers** - Pull out variables, components, and layouts from a design to ensure builds adhere to design patterns. 
• **Code smarter with Code Connect** - Boost output quality by reusing your actual components, the MCP server informs AI agents about existing components derived from Code Connect information. 
• **Map your flows with diagrams** - The Figma MCP server can turn your Claude prompts into flow charts, Gantt charts, or other diagrams in FigJam. 

 **Note:** The get_screenshot tool is currently limited to returning a descripton of screenshots in Figma when called in Claude and Claude Code. See developer term [here](https://www.figma.com/legal/developer-terms/)
server.title: Figma

com.anthropic.api/mcp-registry.oneLiner: Generate diagrams and better code from Figma context
com.anthropic.api/mcp-registry.claudeCodeCopyText: claude mcp add --transport http figma-remote-mcp https://mcp.figma.com/mcp
com.anthropic.api/mcp-registry.htmlContent:
Pull in Figma context and generate high-quality code that aligns with your codebase and design intent. Use the connector to retrieve code resources from Figma Design or Make files, and turn your ideas into production apps.

You can use the Figma connector to:

Implement designs as websites:
